name: Fish Off Sloth
description:
Best played in chromium browsers.

A one or two player platformer based on a little inside joke from the super animal royale community!

Sadly only one level in the game jam version. We plan to continue to work on the game and rewrite it in unity! :3

Controls:
Player 1:

  • ad to move
  • w to jump and double jump 
  • left shift to shoot

Player 2:

  • left, right arrow to move
  • up arrow to jump and double jump
  • right shift to shoot

Game should support controllers, though untested.

Credits

  • Art by https://twitter.com/Sun_nyaan
  • Sound and music cobbled together (ran out of time) from previous game jams, credits are on those pages.
